rules.output: Drink plenty of water and get some rest
Try to get a good night's sleep
Clean the wound with soap and water, then apply an antiseptic
Apply direct pressure to the wound and seek immediate medical help
Elevate the injured area and apply pressure to control bleeding, then seek medical attention
Avoid heavy or spicy foods, and consider taking an antacid

Take a short nap or try relaxation techniques
Apply pressure to the wound and seek medical attention
Apply pressure and elevate the wound, then seek medical attention
